channel.title: Blogs on Mirza Waleed
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Mirza Waleed

item.description: How to ceate your website using Hugo & Github Pages by Mirza Waleed (24-08-2022) In this post, I will share how I made My Portfolio/Bloging Website using Github Pages and Hugo. Originally, i get inspired from this twitter thread and started preparing my website from scratch. For better understanding of whole process install following: Install VS Code Installl Hugo Create a Github account Install github extension in VS code and login to your github
